_comment: Token usage tracking for AI conversations. Update 'current_usage' manually or via script.

_instructions.daily_limit: Your subscription daily token limit (check at claude.ai/settings)
_instructions.warning_threshold: At 90% AI will warn you to wrap up
_instructions.current_usage: UPDATE THIS: Tokens used today (reset at midnight UTC)
_instructions.last_reset: UPDATE THIS: ISO date when current_usage was reset to 0

_usage_notes.how_to_update: After each session, update current_usage += tokens_used_in_session
_usage_notes.how_to_reset: At start of new day (UTC midnight), set current_usage = 0 and update last_reset
_usage_notes.automation: You can create a script to auto-update this file (see templates/update-tokens.sh)

history._comment: Optional: Track daily usage for analytics
